title: Hextech Crafting and Honor
body: So today, as some may know, Riot disabled Hextech crafting for sometime earlier, but as I logged in, from honor, I received two key fragments. I later logged in to open a chest because I had 1 yesterday and could now craft a key, but when I opened the menu, I still had 1. Now I could even be imagining I hadd 1 key fragment, but the fact that I still have one means it did not register.

replies.body: Oh ok, maybe those happened. I will check. Sorry to bug you over two fragments.

No worries ^_^! Stuff can be confusing sometimes, always happy to help!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

It looks like the last time this account was given 2 key fragments at the same time was back on 8-02, so this notification might have been delayed from then. There's also a chance that when crafting was reenabled, it for some reason triggered that notification again. After looking over your hextech history though, it does look like you're sitting at the right amount.
